message: Has anybody bothered using namespaces yet? And is it just me or does the forward slash syntax absolutely suck?!
@pjburgess I can't imagine programming without namespaces. It's better for me, faster and backslashes aren't problem.
I've been using them for a long time now, and the backslashes don't bother me at all. They're actually pretty cute.

I like the namespaces. The slash can seem odd at first. Just think of it as a logical path, which makes it easier to standardize naming conventions. So then you have file paths with one slash and logical paths with the other...works for me at least.
it's not bad idea to use them =)
I always use namespaces now. It helps when your IDE understands them and can autocomplete classes (Eclipse + PDT)
i haven't had the chance to introduce namespaces yet but i'm planning on using them when i have the chance.
I'm always using namespaces. Every framework does it to
